entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replacing explicit read access for external contributors with team membership #201

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QUIC port conflicts do not report an error #59382
  • Move throw calls inside `ThrowHelper.Get*` methoda #59378
    7.0.0
  • Rosetta x64 translation fools arch detection in installers #59370
    6.0.0
  • Refine JsonIgnoreAttribute semantics when used in conjunction with other attributes. #59364
    7.0.0
  • Replace GenerateFileFromTemplate with arcade task #59355
  • XmlReader.Create Fails When Path Contains Private Area Unicode Characters #59353
  • [QUIC] SendResettableCompletionSource set exception in AbortWrite #59347
  • [QUIC] Stream refactorings #59346
  • [QUIC] Do not call msquic in a lock #59345
  • NullabilityInfoContext weird behavior #59344
  • [API Proposal]: Add a new signature to `Sum` to be able to do: `Sum((x, i) => ...)` #59336
  • IconConverterTest.TestConvertTo fail on net48 on non-English Windows #59333
    Future
  • X509Certificate2 with Private Key without User Profile not possible on Windows #59329
    Future
  • HTTP 400 ("Invalid Host header") for link-local IPv6 addresses #59341
  • Issue with Aspose PDF library under net6.0 #59327
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail many test in VS with "Unable to load DLL 'libgdiplus' or one of its dependencies" #59326
  • Asc_Chr_Invariant fail tests on net48 with current culture is not English #59325
    Future
  • Very basic findall against list literal is broken. #59358
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary.TrimExcess #59324

Closed

  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException : A generic error occurred in GDI+ #58741
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json no longer disregards members with JsonConverterAttribute and JsonIgnoreAttribute #58469
    6.0.0
  • Wasm native dependencies: [DllImport] in own source code doesn't work #59255
    6.0.0
  • Implicit SourceGenerator: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration (net 6.0) #59284
  • I can't reference Codepages #59348
  • Using System.Text.Json, IAsyncEnumerable, and source generation together doesn't work #58221
    7.0.0
  • Do not create Subrange Assertions for the full range of an integer #12936
    Future
  • error is given to load p7b in X509Certificate2Collection #59304
  • [MONO][Interp] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:6813, condition `td->clause_indexes [in_offset] != -1' not met #54371
    7.0.0
  • This program location is thought to be unreachable - RC1 #59330
  • XmlReader.ReadContentAs{Async} different behavior #52646
    7.0.0
  • Sending HTTP requests without normalizing path and query #58057
    6.0.0
  • Feature add ability to turn off canonicalization in System.Uri #52628
    6.0.0
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Problem linking with libnethost.lib #59143
  • [RyuJIT] bounds checks aren't eliminated for array[0] access when different indices are already accessed #39156
    Future
  • [JIT] Emitted bounds check comparing a constant index against a constant length #10686
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add notes about not calling src-gen APIs directly and make them non-browsable #59385
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update Unloadability documentation #59383
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [testing] Add retry configuration and temporary test #59381
  • Delete a legacy local for arm32. #59380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Release 6.0 rc2 localized manifest #59379
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix issues where the module index GUID table isn't properly computed #59377
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issues where the module index GUID table isn't properly computed #59375
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move clang-format download into dotnet/runtime and add docs for setting up auto-formatting in the repository #59374
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Reverting the old behavior of scope id numeration #59372
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Release/6.0]fix the package version for non-shipping csproj packages #59369
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Reverting the old behavior of scope id numeration #59368
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Updated ConvertTo_String tests in System.Drawing.Common.Tests for null values #59367
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Generic Math Preview - Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59366
    area-System.Numerics
  • [QUIC] Listener Comment #59365
    area-System.Net
  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix xmldoc of TypeGenerationSpec #59361
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable experimental nuget retry on rc2 lanes (already enabled on main) #59360
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable more SendPacketsElement tests on Win11 #59359
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Update area owners to include new owners of S.DS.* #59357
    area-Meta
  • [mono][wasm] Rework the handling of GC references in AOTed code. #59352
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Don't try to unbox this argument during calli #59351
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [x86/Linux] Fix SIGSEGV on Debugger.Break() during debugging. #59350
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Generic Math Preview - Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59349
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    community-contribution
  • File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59338
    area-System.IO
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Don't assert when encountering invalid IL opcode #59334
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix crossgen for FreeBSD by adding FreeBSD RID. #59331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail ToLogFont_Invoke tests on non English Windows #59328
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] x64 on ARM64 fixes #59295
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Delete duplicate runtime tests #58676
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Tests fail tests with NaN conversion #59321
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Change logic to not break private runs #59356
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Create and publish missing symbols #59259
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Ignore MSBuild_Logs/ directory #59323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59205
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Suppress SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success test on Windows 11 #59203
    area-System.Net
  • Remove some unnecessary allocations / copies on startup #59270
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59231
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Delete dead code #56865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for endfinally opcode #59332
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use PowerShell in Android arm64 XHarness Helix payloads #59340
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] fix debug build #59317
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bring XmlReader{Async} to one behavior #51736
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • EmccCompile: reduce allowedParallelism by 1, to account for the implicit core #59244
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59293
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fix NullReferenceException on Timeout when streaming request body #59204
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] Review comments #58608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Make Float-to-Integer conversions compatible with x86 #58831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Increase the range of allowable native metadata handles #1581

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify integration of NonBacktracking into Regex #1582

Merged

  • Fix typo #1583
  • Document the reflectedonly mode #1579
    area-NativeAOT
  • added special treatment of singletons in SymbolicRegexSet #1570
  • Make GetFixedPrefix in SymbolicRegexNode iterative #1569
  • Ensure metadata addressing limit at compile time #1580
  • Remove custom serialization mechanism from symbolic regex #1558
  • Do not generate unused metadata #1578
    area-NativeAOT
  • Remove FixedArgument from metadata schema #1577
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Compile NativeAOT on x86 #1531

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • M1 Mac cannot find libhostfxr.dylib #21187
  • Missing 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor' when building SDK on FreeBSD [6.0-rc1] #21178
  • Dotnet runtime store: Crossgen can't find the System.Runtime 4.2.2.0 (dotnet 3.1) #21173
  • Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation missing for .NET 6 RC1 #21167
  • Some CLI commands don't respect DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE #21159

Closed

  • .NET stack temporary folder cannot be accessed after running under sudo #20195
  • Release metadata for 6.0.0-rc.1 has wrong release date set #21054
    Backlog
  • Known workloads show workloads which are not intended for public consumption #20709
    6.0.1xx
  • MSBuild error for dotnet build with --self-contained #20992
  • .NET 6 Preview 6 SDK: System.IO.FileLoadException when running net461 app from publish location #19329
    6.0.1xx
  • Break Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation into two packages #17758
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx-rc2' => 'main' #21192
    Area-Compatibility
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1373234 #21182
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update top level help with workload string #21177
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1368921 #21100
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 10 minutes time out of TransactionScope #21102
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc2] BlazorWasm: Fix including the target assembly #21104
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Typo in EditorConfig UI ("carrage return") #56558
  • Lambda expressions with attributes are formatted incorrectly #56543
  • Compiler raising CS1513 & 1514 in response to file scoped namespace on .NET6 RC1 using VS2019 16.11.3 Preview 1.0 #56542
  • Smart Snippets #56541

Closed

  • StackOverflow in the NullableWalker when method is used in an attribute on the method #47125
    17.0
  • Can we get more information in inheritance margin? #56535
  • Eccentric finalization in C# interactive #56529
  • Is it possible to run vs 2019 code analyze by command and not by gui? #56528

PullRequests

Created

  • When "assigned", a `discard` doesn't escape out of the current expression. #56564
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactoring #56563
    Area-Interactive
  • Add checklist entry for templates to compiler test plan #56562
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1373589 #56561
  • Merge main to dev17.1-preview1 #56560
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56557
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56555
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix formatting of overload with new #56554
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid switching to UI thread in some option persisters #56553
    Area-IDE
  • Enable async lightbulbs by default #56551
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate lsp versions for preview5 #56550
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add missing releases to NuGet documentation #56546
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56525
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Separate the process of performing nullable analysis on attribute applications from the process of filling the attribute bag with data. #56545
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56556
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps into features/snappy/nodelay #56552
    Area-IDE, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps back to release/dev17.0 #56451
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize InheritanceMarginGlyph construction #56471
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56539
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56536
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56537
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56565
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Unify code for pragma placements #56285
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56472
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • EnC/HR interface unification #56424
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit lambda return type #56534
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56476
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Verify new roslyn overload resolution changes don't break minimal API scenarios #36776
    6.0.0
  • Error: Failed to start the connection: Error: None of the transports supported by the client are supported by the server #36775
  • If Razor diagnostics publishing fails it can crash VS #36774
    17.0-Preview5
  • Certain Razor settings not respected when closing and re-opening Razor file #36773
    17.0-Preview5
  • Add editorconfig support in Razor #36772
    17.0-Preview5
  • Planning for Minimal APIs in .NET 7 #36770
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor "datetime-local", cannot input value into the browser. #36767
  • Template/MVC tests fail after updating TFM to net7.0 #36765
  • Xamarin iOS: SignalR nuget package throws MissingMethodException #36763
  • Disable _content Static Web Assets Generation #36761
  • Blazor UI crash (reload) on httpClient request when origin is form.button onclick event #36755
  • Design issues on Registration/Login pages in Angular SPA template #36750
  • Azure stdoutLogFile default value causes startup failure 500.31 ANCM Failed to Find Native Dependencies #36749
  • CVE-2021-26701 security error with System.Text.Encodings.Web dependency #36748
  • Hot Reload with dotnet watch run doen't work. The call /_framework/blazor-hotreload returns status 204 #36745
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Dockerized not working in debug mode #36742
  • [blazor] Can nuget packages that enables p2p be supported in blazor? is it possible for now? #36741
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding static assets outside the ```wwwroot``` folder #36740
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36737
  • Blazor Server Template with all Identity Scaffolded items creates warnings in 6.0.0-rc.1 #36734
  • VS 2022 preview 4: Blazor project issues when opening a solution after VS update #36732
    6.0.0

Closed

  • [Feedback] New Razor (ASP.NET Core) editor .editorconfig issues (VS 2022 Preview 3.1) #36010
    17.0-Preview5
  • Components that mirror HTML elements cause invalid errors #36569
    17.0-Preview5
  • Include AddEndpointsApiExplorer in ASP.NET Core Web API template By default #36696
    6.0-rc2
  • Support extension methods for custom TryParse/BindAsync declared on a static class with a known name #36664
  • PageTitle component breaks in .NET 6 RC1 Blazor Server after hot reload #36116
    6.0-rc1
  • Closing / Reopening same solution 3-4x + results in Razor SolutionClosing state being invalid #36697
    17.0-Preview5
  • Hot reload not working for cshtml #36098
    6.0.0
  • Startup improvement: json #36738
  • NETSDK1082 There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm' #36711
  • Problem with RedirectWwwRule #9274
    Backlog
  • Duplicated reference by transitive dependence #36728
  • Use Package Validation SDK #33981
  • SQLException when using usermanager.ResetPasswordAsync #36240
    Discussions
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string query parameter support #36511
  • VS2022 Preview 4 Very high CPU Consumption even when Idle #36710
  • app.UseWebAssemblyDebugging() returns Method not found after update from 6.0 preview 7 to 6.0 RC 1 #36538
  • Using HotReload with bind-Value causes an exception #36659
  • We need better way to deal with css animations. Reliable OnAnimationEnd, allow element to force re-render or something. #36700
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Performing hot reload when the browser is closed results in a unhelpful exception #36733
  • Blazor server PageTitle component not working with Hot reload #36735
  • Version 16.11.3 broke something. New warnings appear! #36736
  • Blazor WASM .NET 6 RC1: Occasionally Reading the JavaScript Cookie fails in #36746
  • Remove reference to PhysicalFileProvider from WebViewManager to fix iOS App Store publishing #35707
    6.0-rc2
  • Revert Enforce WebSockets Transport for Blazor #36655
    6.0-rc2
  • RequestDelegateFactory (minimal APIs) should support discovering TryParse & BindAsync methods from inherited types #36663
    6.0-rc2
  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36716
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #35820
  • RazorPage: @code in index.cshtml produce compile error #36731

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor Server Allow `unsafe-inline` #36771
    area-blazor
  • Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36768
  • Bump tmpl from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36766
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • Blazor Server Add Console Error if Long Polling #36764
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Parse date types into UTC by default #36762
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/5.0] Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36758
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36757
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] onBoard package validation #36751
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Put concatenated `string`s in parentheses #36756
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Call AddEndpointsApiExplorer() in controllers Web API template #36752
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    area-signalr, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36695
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Clear layout directories before copies #36719
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Call AddEndpointsApiExplorer() in controllers Web API template #36753
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36578
    Servicing-approved, api-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Pin analyzers that ship in the SDK (#36690) #36754
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB4057 The target "StaticWebAssetsPrepareForRun" does not exist in the project. #2609
  • [Bug] Look at switching to Connected Animations on WinUI #2604
  • Search control BackgroundColor #2602
  • [Bug] UriImageSourceService fails to load some images on Windows #2601
  • [Bug] Shell Flyout items are never deselected on Android #2600
  • [Enhancement] Introduce an AppThemeColor #2597
  • [Bug] There are no example NUnit or MSTest projects for testing Maui libraries using VS 2022 preview 4 #2594
  • [Bug] Memory stream is closed inside MauiAppBuilder while configuring the host configuration. #2592

Closed

  • FocusAsync not working from blazor desktop wpf #2528
  • The type or namespace name 'Shared' does not exist in the namespace #2359
  • [Bug] Catalyst requests access to Documents #1920
  • [Spec] Slim Renderer Architecture #28
  • [Bug] Blazor integration issue for iOS and MacOS StaticWebAssets.build.json does not exist #2468
  • [Bug] Add a .NET MAUI project to a new MAUI solution, build error #2585

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset internal list for row/column defs when updating them; #2608
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • Updated the BuildForLegacy Build prop for Comet #2607
  • [android] use a custom Resource.designer.cs #2606
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Removing Reloadify ##2524 #2603

Merged

  • Fix Replace XCode version for provisionator #2599
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • Fix layout cycle on Windows when ScrollView content has Margin #2572
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [WIP] Spike using interfaces and shared mappers to achieve ImageButton #2352
  • Border control #2445
  • WinUI navigation view #2551
  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/a11y, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306

Closed

Merged

Updated
